quotes.text: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Our passion is our strength.
quotes.author: Billie Armstrong

quotes.text: Wisdom is always an overmatch for strength.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.text: Our strength grows out of our weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Silence is a source of great strength.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
quotes.author: Paul CÃ©zanne

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: More often than not, anger is actually an indication of weakness rather than of strength.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.text: By going beyond your own problems and taking care of others, you gain inner strength, self-confidence, courage, and a greater sense of calm.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: When I dare to be powerful, to use my strength in the service of my vision, then it becomes less and less important whether I am afraid.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: I look forward to a great future for America - a future in which our country will match its military strength with our moral restraint, its wealth with our wisdom, its power with our purpose.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: I hope we shall crush in its birth the aristocracy of our monied corporations which dare already to challenge our government to a trial by strength, and bid defiance to the laws of our country.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: Self-control is strength.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.text: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu
